Usage of the Demommath Package¶

Installation¶

1pip install demommath

Using the commands¶

To call the functions by specifying their directory (These functions are imported in the __init__.py files of the respective directories):

## Usage for adding numbers

1from demommath import addsub
2addsub.add(2,8)
310

## Usage for subtracting numbers

1from demommath import addsub
2addsub.subtract(3,5)
3-2

## Usage for multiplying numbers

1from demommath import multidiv
2multidiv.multiply(4,9)
336

## Usage for dividing numbers

1from demommath import multidiv
2multidiv.divide(5,4)
31.25

## Usage for identifying odd and even numbers

1from demommath import odd_even
2odd_even.is_odd_or_even(6)
3'Even'

## Usage for finding LCM of 3 numbers

1from demommath import calculations
2calculations.lcm(5,7,8)
3280

## Usage for finding mean of a list of numbers

1from demommath import calculations
2calculations.find_mean([4,6,7,3,5])
35.0

## Usage for identifying prime numbers

1from demommath import prime_num
2prime_num.is_prime(5)
3True

## Usage for adding arrays

1from demommath import sumarray
2sumarray.add_num([5,6,7],[4,3,2])
3array([9, 9, 9])

To call the default functions (These functions are imported in the __init__.py file in the main directory):

## Usage for adding numbers

1import demommath as dmaddsub
2dm.add(5,6)
311

## Usage for subtracting numbers

1import demommath as dm
2dm.subtract(5,6)
3-1

## Usage for finding LCM of 3 numbers

1import demommath as dm
2dm.lcm(5,7,8)
3280

## Usage for finding mean of a list of numbers

1import demommath as dm
2dm.find_mean([4,6,7,3,5])
35.0

To call the functions directly (These functions are defined in the __all__ list in the __init__.py file of the main directory):

## Usage for adding numbers

1from demommath import *
2add(3,6)
39

## Usage for finding LCM of 3 numbers

1from demommath import *
2lcm(5,7,8)
3280

## Usage for finding mean of a list of numbers

1from demommath import *
2find_mean([4,6,7,3,5])
35.0
